# loadAllManagersFromPreferences(completionHandler:)

**Type Method**

Asynchronously reads all the relay configurations previously created and saved by the calling app.

## Declaration

```swift
class func loadAllManagersFromPreferences(completionHandler: @escaping ([NERelayManager], (any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
class func loadAllManagersFromPreferences() async throws -> [NERelayManager]
```

## Parameters

- **completionHandler**: A block that receives an array of [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NERelayManager] objects. If the system failed to read any [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NERelay] configurations read from the disk, the array is passes to the block is empty. The [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSError] passed to this block is `nil` if the load operation succeeded, non-`nil` otherwise.
